decision_conditions: The glazing in windows mentioned in the list below must achieve a minimum level of obscurity equivalent to Pilkington Texture Glass Level 3 and shall not be openable below a height of 1.7 metres above the finished floor level of the room they serve. Both requirements shall be completely installed in accordance with these requirements before the development hereby approved is first occupied and shall thereafter be maintained and retained in accordance with these details. List on windows this condition relates to: Ground floor window on the eastern elevation serving a bathroom; Ground floor window on the southern elevation serving the staircase; Ground floor window on the southern elevation serving the ensuite (Bedroom 5); Ground floor window on the southern elevation serving the utility room; and Roof / First floor window on the southern elevation servicing the ensuite (Bedroom 1).
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

  • ALDB/02/F - Proposed Plans and Elevations - 06/2024
  • Block Plan - 27/11/2017
  • Location Plan - 15/06/2024

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
description:
Demolition of existing garage, construction of a single storey side
extension with two roof lights including relocation of entrance to the
front, construction of a two storey rear extension, construction of two side
dormer extensions, addition of a Juliette balcony to the rear elevation and the
addition of 4 windows to the ground floor side elevation
